DOC.brief_summary: In order examine effect RIPC skeleton muscle exertional damage aerobic anaerobic physical performance , 30 healthy volunteer undergo series different physical test twice ; without intervention second time RIPC intervention placebo ( false ) intervention .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Physical Performance Exertional Rhabdomyolysis
DOC.detailed_description: 30 healthy civilian volunteer recruit divide randomly 2 group : RIPC group control group . The experiment protocol consist 2 series ( month ) , series include describe 3 day : Day 1 - anthropometry measurement VO2max test ( BRUCE protocol ) . Day 2 - step test ( heled protocol ) . Day 3 - anaerobic test ( wingate protocol ) , 1 hour rest time exhaustion test ( heled protocol ) . The first series perform without apply intervention consider baseline measurement group . second series perform follow : a. RIPC group : apply RIPC exposure ( place sphygmomanometer non-dominant hand apply pressure 200 mmHg 5 min follow 5 min without pressure X 4 repeat ) begin every meeting . b. control group : placebo ( false ) exposure ( place sphygmomanometer non-dominant hand apply pressure 100 mmHg 5 min follow 5 min without pressure X 4 repeat ) begin every meeting . Blood ample , lactic acid urine sample test begin end every meeting ( test muscle , skeleton kidney function marker ) .
DOC.criteria: aged 1830 healthy civilian volunteer background illnesses average fitness know chronic medical illness routine medication usage history rhabdomyolysis physician decision
